actions.text: Amendment SA 786 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 3. Record Vote Number: 30.

Amendment SA 786 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S444; text: CR S444) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to maintaining the United States Embassy in Jerusalem, Israel.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 786 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 786 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 3. Record Vote Number: 30.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 786 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 3. Record Vote Number: 30.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to maintaining the United States Embassy in Jerusalem, Israel.
